description: This is a parts kit for the chainguide assembly on your Ghost Riot.Kit includes: 1 x chainguide 53.8mm x 25.7mm x 5mm, 2 x washer Ø4mm x Ø9mm x 2mm, 2 x chainguide screw M4mm x 12mm x 7mm - T15, 1 x carbon looking foil carbon surface, 1 x CS aluminum protector.
name: Ghost Riot Chainguide Assembly Kit #KE0175
